snippet: "It seems that a lot of things in my life are up in the air," writes Chandler Buckingham, a student at Rogers High School in Rogers, Ark., "and the suspense is threatening to wear me down."
abstract: "It seems that a lot of things in my life are up in the air," writes Chandler Buckingham, a student at Rogers High School in Rogers, Ark., "and the suspense is threatening to wear me down."

headline.main: Navigating College Admissions While 'Pretty Seriously Depressed'
